participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Creative and caring, with a playful side.
participant_1.background: I have to be careful not to eat too many gummy worms or I'll get sick. ke ha is my favorite singer of all time. I created a mobile with cute animals to hang above my baby's crib. I spend way too much time on my phone in the morning. I make and me by waiting tables.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, with a passion for family.
participant_2.background: I am trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby. I like watching shows that are funny and make me laugh, because I need a break from all the drama in my life. I dye my hair blonde. I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working and am enjoying my time with my family in a small mountain town. I'm not rich, but I do take care of my health.

content.text: Hi, what do you do for a living?
I am an actor, but I am currently on a break from working.
Oh cool! What made you want to become an actor?
I've always loved performing, and I think it's a great way to connect with people.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try acting but I'm too shy.
You should definitely give it a try! There are a lot of great resources out there to help you get started.
Thanks, I might just do that!
Awesome! What kind of shows do you like to watch?
I love watching funny shows, because I need a break from all the drama in my life.
Me too! I love watching shows that make me laugh.
Have you seen the show "The Office"?
Yes! I love that show!
Me too! It's one of my favorites.
It's so funny! What's your favorite episode?
I don't know if I can pick a favorite episode, but I love the one where Michael Scott tries to fire Toby.
That's a great episode! I also love the one where Jim and Dwight try to prank each other.
Yes! Those are two of my favorites too!
We seem to have similar taste in shows.
I think so too! We should watch a show together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free next weekend.
Perfect! I'll text you some show suggestions.
Sounds good!
